title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 7.3 - Limitations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 7.3 - Limitations

State Regulations

This supervisory policy applies only to documents
originating in countries which are party to the convention. The Banking

Department will rely on opinions of counsel or other appropriate evidence from
parties seeking to use this supervisory policy that the country in which the
documents originate is a party to the convention. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
7.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
